messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always supported Britain’s membership of the European Union. That’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We know that public finances are tight, but we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would provide the extra funds.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in South West Hertfordshire. Schools in Hertfordshire are set to lose over £75 million from their budgets by 2019.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
Additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency.
Opposing school cuts and addressing budget shortfalls.
